prodNameC: 美利迪恩EB病毒免疫球蛋白G檢測驗系統
ingredientsDesc: EBV Antigen Substrate Slides: Ten Teflon-coated 10-well slides with HR1 Burkitt’s lymphocytic cells fixed onto each well.  Phosphate Buffered Saline (PBS powder): The rehydrated solution is a 0.01M phosphate buffer with a pH of 7.5 and contains sodium azide.  Positive and Negative Control Sera lyophilized: Each human control serum is reconstituted with 1 ml PBS to give a 1:10 working dilution.  Conjugate lyophilized: Fluorescein-labeled antihuman IgG (caprine) is reconstituted with 3 ml of PBS  Mounting Fluid: The mounting fluid is a glycerol-water combination formulated to minimize elution of counterstain.
applicantAddr: 台北市信義區松德路７４號８樓
efficacy: 螢光免疫檢測做為偵測Epstein-Barr Virus 對應的IgG抗體。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: 3471 RIVER HILLS DRIVE, CINCINNATI, OH 45244, U.S.A.
